user: Show me beginner friendly meditation events
bot:
I found some beginner-friendly meditation events that might interest you:

1. **[VRC] [JP] The meeting ends at midnight**
   - **What**: A regular event at the Jiho Jiho Community Center, with activities that culminate at midnight.
   - **When**: November 22, 2024, starting at 6:45 AM (VR Time).
   - **Details**: This event focuses on social gatherings and is beginner-friendly. Join by connecting to the Jiho Jiho Parking Lot group.

2. **[VRC] [JP] [First-time visitors welcome] Store-type event "cafe & bar "outsider""**
   - **What**: A chat cafe/bar event where you can try on avatars and meet others in a relaxed setting.
   - **When**: November 28, 2024, starting at 5:00 AM (VR Time).
   - **Details**: This event is beginner-friendly and takes place in a store environment. Join the group "BGAVCY.1622" to participate.

3. **[VRC] Group meditation lesson & practice @ VR Mystery School**
   - **What**: A group meditation session focusing on 'Mindfulness of Breathing', perfect for beginners.
   - **When**: December 2, 2024, starting at 9:00 AM (VR Time).
   - **Details**: Join this event to learn meditation from a guide and participate in a group session. Connect through the VRChat World link provided.

Which event would you like to attend? Please let me know your choice, and I'll assist you with joining the event!
turn_context:
task_list = TaskList(user_task = 'Explore Event') answer = answer('find beginner-friendly meditation events') answer.result = [Event(id: str = '79c8526ctvfnofcfhta48cpv90@google.com', summary: str = '[VRC] [JP] The meeting ends at midnight.', start_time: time = datetime.datetime(2024, 11, 22, 6, 45, tzinfo=datetime.timezone(datetime.timedelta(days=-1, seconds=57600))), end_end: time = 'None', location: str = 'None', description: str = "--Event Organizer--n新arata, パズ_PAZ, あかぼうず, ibakyu, ネオレイ, natsu_white, 菅原のタツジ, まるさん, fcode, miyako_TNT, anthroteq, 海野夜見, 鳳丈橙蘭, めるこちゃん, Sheena_baobab, Hachi8×8×8, おかゆ。, ユウユウ, 匠/takumi, Sa-maru（さーまる）, のらたま, のあいちご, パッキー226, イザベラさん, プォカリス・エット, memepi, yamaneko013, shigezou, 澤村さん, ひなげし【】, okwsin, Paroji-ぱろじ, FUTOTI[ふとち], きんにく, tamakusu, そうりん〈Sourin〉n--Event Details--nPop-pop-pop! The final meeting, which ends at midnight, will be held at the Jiho Jiho Community Center, a world that explodes and falls with the time signal at 24:00! Please note that this event is held every day.n--Event Type--nOther social gatherings, events for beginners, regular eventsn--Participation Requirements--nPlease act and use avatars in a way that does not interfere with the progress of the event.n--How to Join--nJoin Jihojiho Parking Lot (closing session ends at midnight) (https://vrc.group/JIHOU0.1213), which is a group that ends at midnight, and join (the instance is Created by Group+)n--Notes--nThe hashtag is #Meeting ends at midnightnJiho Jiho's Discord, Jiho cord is here↓nhttps://discord.gg/wHyP2MHtjKn"), Event(id: str = 'cecpt6sdostgesun7vuek1atlc@google.com', summary: str = '[VRC] [JP] [First-time visitors welcome] Store-type event "cafe & bar "outsider""', start_time: time = datetime.datetime(2024, 11, 28, 5, 0, tzinfo=datetime.timezone(datetime.timedelta(days=-1, seconds=57600))), end_end: time = 'None', location: str = 'None', description: str = '--Event Organizer--n來宮りこ(VRCID:Lycoris_213)n--Event Details--nThis is an avatar made by BUGAISYA that is sold at the booth.n[Original 3D model] Papillon + Papillon +n[Original 3D model] FlezanThis is a chat cafe/bar event run by children wearing costumes and avatars featuring the main character!nThere is a pedestal for the avatar, so you can try it on as a sample!nUnfortunately, Avatar is only compatible with PC, please understand.n--Event Type--nStore events, events for beginners, regular eventsn--Participation Requirements--nModel: Please refrain from using illegal avatars or avatars that explicitly reproduce or use data from anime/games.nOther than that, you are free! The number of people is 32 including the store staff, but if there are more people, we will create a second instance.n--How to Join--nWe are planning a group public event, so please join the group "BGAVCY.1622" in advance.nYou can participate by sending an application to the store manager "Lycoris_213" and joining at the specified time.n--Notes--n◆Time schedulen22:00-Openingn22:50-Group photon23:00-Dissolution/Aftern'), Event(id: str = 'ueopnbiiad4ncr89qhkbn7t9lb@google.com', summary: str = '[VRC] Group meditation lesson & practice @ VR Mystery School', start_time: time = datetime.datetime(2024, 12, 2, 9, 0, tzinfo=datetime.timezone(datetime.timedelta(days=-1, seconds=57600))), end_end: time = 'None', location: str = 'None', description: str = 'EU Timezone session of our weekly Group Meditation Activity
Here we focus on the Buddhist 'Mindfulness of Breathing' style of meditation
(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anapanasati)

New to meditation? Here's your chance to learn it from a guide!
This is also an opportunity to enjoy meditation with others, regardless of your experience! 
At the end of the activity, those interested may join in discussion about joys and hardships practicing meditation.


About the VR Mystery School
The Virtual Reality Mystery School is a community of people enthusiastic about well being, personal development, spiritual and mystical theory and practice, and general making sense of the human experience. We look further than the mainstream, to try and learn from traditional and modern perspectives alike. Reconnect with "the wisdom of all ages", and the world heritage of mystical philosophy and practice, through a sharable VR experience.

Here we focus on the Buddhist 'Mindfulness of Breathing' style of meditation
(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anapanasati)

New to meditation? Here's your chance to learn it from a guide!
This is also an opportunity to enjoy meditation with others, regardless of your experience! 
At the end of the activity, those interested may join in discussion about joys and hardships practicing meditation.


About the VR Mystery School
The Virtual Reality Mystery School is a community of people enthusiastic about well being, personal development, spiritual and mystical theory and practice, and general making sense of the human experience. We look further than the mainstream, to try and learn from traditional and modern perspectives alike. Reconnect with "the wisdom of all ages", and the world heritage of mystical philosophy and practice, through a sharable VR experience.


To join the session, choose one of these options:

Join our public instance 10 minutes before event time using the VRChat World url:
